original: Parivāra
8. Uposathādipucchāvissajjanā
1 Ādimajjhantapucchana
Uposathakammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
Pavāraṇākammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
Tajjanīyakammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁ta jj anīy akamm assa ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Niyassakammassa …pe…
pabbājanīyakammassa …pe…
paṭisāraṇīyakammassa …pe…
ukkhepanīyakammassa …pe…
parivāsadānassa …pe…
mūlāyapaṭikassanāya …pe…
mānattadānassa …pe…
abbhānassa …pe…
upasampadākammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
Tajjanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁ta jj anīy akamm assa ▁ paṭippassaddh iyā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Niyassakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁ni y assa kamm assa ▁ paṭippassaddh iyā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Pabbājanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁pabbāj anīy akamm assa ▁ paṭippassaddh iyā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Paṭisāraṇīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁paṭi sār aṇīy akamm assa ▁ paṭippassaddh iyā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Ukkhepanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁u kkhep anīy akamm assa ▁ paṭippassaddh iyā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Sativinayassa ko ādi, kiṁ majje, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁sati vinay assa ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁ majj e ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Amūḷhavinayassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
Tassapāpiyasikāya ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁tassa pāp iy as ikāya ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Tiṇavatthārakassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁tiṇ avatth ā ra kassa ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Bhikkhunovādakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁bhikkhuno vād aka sammuti yā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Ticīvarena avippavāsasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁ticīvar ena ▁a vippavās a sammuti yā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Santhatasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁ santhat a sammuti yā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Rūpiyachaḍḍakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁rūp iya cha ḍ ḍ aka sammuti yā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Sāṭiyaggāhāpakasammutiyo ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁sā ṭ iya ggāh āpa ka sammuti yo ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Pattaggāhāpakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁patt agg ā hāp aka sammuti yā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Daṇḍasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
Sikkāsammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁si kk ā sammuti yā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Daṇḍasikkāsammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
analyzed: ▁daṇḍ asi kk ā sammuti yā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: 2 Ādimajjhantavissajjanā
Uposathakammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
Uposathakammassa sāmaggī ādi, kiriyā majjhe, niṭṭhānaṁ pariyosānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁uposath akamm assa ▁sā magg ī ▁ādi ▁kiriyā ▁majjhe ▁ niṭṭh ānaṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Pavāraṇākammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
Pavāraṇākammassa sāmaggī ādi, kiriyā majjhe, niṭṭhānaṁ pariyosānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁pavāraṇā kamm assa ▁sā magg ī ▁ādi ▁kiriyā ▁majjhe ▁ niṭṭh ānaṃ ▁ pariyosān aṃ

original: Tajjanīyakammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
analyzed: ▁ta jj anīy akamm assa ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān anti

original: Tajjanīyakammassa vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁ta jj anīy akamm assa ▁vatthu ▁ca ▁puggalo ▁ca ▁ādi ▁ñatti ▁majjhe ▁kamm avācā ▁ pariyosān aṃ

abbhānassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
Abbhānassa vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
Upasampadākammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
Upasampadākammassa puggalo ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁upasampad ā kamm assa ▁puggalo ▁ādi ▁ñatti ▁majjhe ▁kamm avācā ▁ pariyosān aṃ

analyzed: ▁ta jj anīy akamm assa ▁ paṭippassaddh iyā ▁ko ▁ādi ▁kiṃ ▁majjhe ▁kiṃ ▁ pariyosān anti

original: Tajjanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā sammāvattanā ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁ta jj anīy akamm assa ▁ paṭippassaddh iyā ▁sammā vattan ā ▁ādi ▁ñatti ▁majjhe ▁kamm avācā ▁ pariyosān aṃ
